name: Darkness (Julia Yamamoto)
description:
Darkness is a game made for the Weekly game Jam 144. The theme was: "In the dark".

You are a small jellyfish that wants to bring light to the dark world where you live. Eating planktons will give you light and touching plants will make you loose a small amount of light but will help you to fulfil your quest!

The purpose was to work with lights, that was new for me. So, the game is a little weird and very fast to finish. But is cute :D Think of it more as a relaxing experience.

Hope you enjoy it!

---
